subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Two predatory goals from Diego Forlán, the second of them as extra time was running out, gave Atlético Madrid the inaugural Europa Cup with a 2-1 victory over  Fulham.
snippet: Two predatory goals from Diego Forlán, the second of them as extra time was running out, gave Atlético Madrid the inaugural Europa Cup with a 2-1 victory over  Fulham.
